product.title: NIKE Men's Air Max Ltd 3 Running Shoe
product.description:
The Nike Air Max LTD 3 Men's Running Shoes are composed of a durable leather upper. Cushioned tongue and lining combine to provide an excellent feel at your feet. Signature Air Max bubble at the heel and cushioned midsole give your feet long-lasting comfort. Non-marking rubber outsole features a traction increase pattern which enhances grip on all surfaces.

Features:
- Smooth leather upper
- Cushioned Lining and padded tongue for added comfort
- Air Bubble at the heel
- Non-marking rubber outsole
- Padded insole for increased comfort

SKU: 687977-011

Material: Leather

Color: Black/White-Dark Grey
